extendedInfo.description: Cool unit calculator!It scientific converter work with this units:  Length: meters , kimometers ,  miles ,  foots ,  centimeters ,  inches , points , millimetres ;  Weight: kilograms ,  grams ,  ounces ,  carats ;  Speed: km/h , m/s , m/m , m/h , cm/s , cm/m ;  Area: meters^2 , kilometers^2 , hectares , ares , miles^2 foots^2 , centimeters^2 , inches^2 , points^2 , millimeters^2 ;  Volume: meters^3 , kilometers^3 , liters , miles^3 , centimeters^3 , inches^3 ;  Time : seconds minutes hours weeks years ; If this application have a bug(s) or poor displayed on your device, send the problem on the developer's e-mail and it guaranteed will be fixed within 2 days.
